ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Spacer weapons - Explosive Bolt
ModMetaData.author: Halituis Amaricanous
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Adds Several new Explosive bolt guns to the Spacer factions and trade inventories.
Apart from all the weapons being explosive in some capacity these specialized explosive bolt weapons fires special detonating rounds that shred enemy armor allowing other team members to get a more empowered shot on your armored foes.
the guns having a more specialized roll of being more suited to splash damage as every shot from these weapons can damage at least twice in a single shot up to multiple.
